trailingComments.value: Register locale instance public methods for global use.

leadingComments.value: Override the translate method to include a reactive state that contains the current loaded language.
In turn, when the language is changed, this will result in updated translations in all reactive
variables, e.g. computed properties, etc.
Register locale instance public methods for global use.

trailingComments.value: Register translation filter globally. Make sure to pass all additional arguments as an array by first
consuming them using rest parameter construct.
